summary: Automation app for Discord or Twitch
architectural_notes: Admin system requires role-based access control (RBAC) with owner role
Subscription management interface should be restricted to admin/owner access only

existing_features.title: Build a user interface that allows users to create, view, edit, and delete automation tasks for Discord and Twitch

Design a modern, clean visual theme with warm earth tones (terracotta, sage green, cream) and clear hierarchy that reflects automation and efficiency, using consistent spacing and typography throughout the interface
Display real-time status and execution logs for automation tasks in the user interface
Add English language support to all user-facing text in the interface, ensuring consistent terminology and clear communication throughout the application
Create a user interface for adding and managing Twitch affiliate and partner accounts, including forms for account credentials and display of account status
Implement passive income tracking for Twitch affiliate and partner accounts, storing revenue data and displaying earnings summaries in the backend and frontend
Create a subscription plans page in the frontend displaying monthly and annual pricing options with clear descriptions and Stripe checkout buttons
Add subscription status display and management to the user interface showing current plan, billing period, next payment date, and options to upgrade, downgrade, or cancel
Implement subscription-based access control restricting Twitch account management and revenue tracking features to active subscribers only
Create an admin dashboard page in the frontend accessible only to the owner showing subscription plan management interface
Add owner profile display in the frontend showing special owner badge or indicator
Add admin navigation link in the header that is only visible to the owner

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a backend system that can store and manage automation tasks for Discord and Twitch services
Implement a task scheduler system that can execute automation tasks at specified intervals or triggers
Add English language support to the interface
Implement account creation system for Twitch affiliate and partner accounts with passive income tracking
Implement a Twitch account management system that allows users to create and manage Twitch affiliate and partner accounts, storing account credentials and status in the backend
Add Stripe subscription system for app access with monthly/annual billing plans

Create backend data model for subscription management including subscription tier (monthly/annual), status (active/inactive/cancelled), start date, end date, and Stripe customer ID stored per user profile
Implement Stripe integration in the backend to handle subscription creation, payment processing, and webhook events for subscription status changes
Add admin login system with owner authentication
Create admin dashboard for managing subscription prices and plans
Implement owner profile with special permissions and recognition
Add an isOwner boolean field to the UserProfile data model in the backend to identify the app owner
Create backend functions to check if the authenticated user is the owner and return owner status
Create backend CRUD functions for managing subscription plans that are restricted to owner access only
Update migration.mo to handle the new isOwner field when upgrading existing user profiles
